entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Apsley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 12:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -10.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: SSW 15 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the evening. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
